1.content:
I sat in my two-door dodge pick up truck, wondering what I was doing sitting outside of your house in your drive. I really had no interest in showing up to your little party since we both hated each other, but something forced me to drive up and check it out.

My name is Billy, and I'm 23-years old. I stand at 5 feet 10 inches, and weigh about 145 pounds, toned. I have short brown hair with green eyes. I was nowhere close to being extremely attractive, but I'm about average, definitely not popular with the ladies by any means.

"Oh, what the hell? I'll go in." I said under my breath as I turned the engine off and stepped out. Closing and locking the door behind me, I started making my way towards the front door, only to stop as I glanced down and saw a couple making out. "Ugh. Get a room, will ya!?"

Shaking my head, I walked past them and entered the house, where the music was loud, and a bunch of other attendees were already drunk.

I paid no attention to the couples that were making out on the couch, instead, I just walked into the kitchen and poured me a cup of punch. Taking one sip, I put the cup down and pulled my phone out of my pocket, browsing through my facebook.

Little did I know, you were right behind me and dropped a shrinking pill inside of my cup, which it quickly dissolved.

Picking up my cup, I quickly gulped it all down in one sip. I immediately regretted it.

"I think I'm going to be sick!" I shouted as I dropped the cup and quickly ran into the bathroom and slammed the door behind me. It was at that moment my vision began to become blurry, and my clothes began to feel loose. Really loose. That's when I began to shrink within my clothes and didn't stop shrinking until I was only 5-inches. I felt the ground below me begin to shake as you entered the bathroom with a smirk on your lips. He tossed the clothes about until I was finally exposed. I gasped as I gazed up right as you were leaning down to wrap your fingers around my tiny body and lifted me up to your grinning face.....
1.title: The day that I shrank

info.description:
In this roleplay, you invited me to your party with only one intention in mind. To shrink me to get pay back for stealing your job! Have fun humiliating me!


THE RULES AND GUIDELINES:
- The roleplay is meant to be written in 1st-person POV (EX: I scream as you begin to lower your bare foot upon me).
- I'm not asking you to write a whole lot. A simple paragraph each response would be fine by me! No one-line replies!
- Keep in mind that I'm the one that shrinks, while you're the one that humiliates and tortures me. Don't switch the roles!
- Do NOT control my characters actions or words. That's my job. You control your own characters actions!
- Do NOT add to anybody else's storyline with me. There will be plenty of chances for you to join and start your own with me if interested.
- Yes, I can be killed, or I can be indestructible. Your choice. If I do die, don't kill me off so soon. Wait at least 15-20 chapters or so!
- You can play as yourself, or create your own character. Your choice. If you do play as yourself, don't get TOO detailed on what you look like.
- Please be extremely detailed in each of your replies. Nobody who likes to read likes to read anything with little to no detail, right? I don't.
- Add only ONE option each response, so the roleplay goes in only ONE direction. I will edit any chapter that has multiple options.
- I don't want anything sexual with animals or bugs. That grosses me out and isn't fun to participate in. Sorry.

I reserve the right to edit and/or delete any chapter(s) that violate any of the rules and guidelines listed above. As long as you follow these simple rules, you won't have to worry about it. If you have any questions, feel free to message me!
info.pretty_title: The Day I Was Shrunk by YOU
